title: What is the function and importance of music and art? - Quora

response.answer_text: the function of art and music, is to fill our lives with beauty, and charm,filling our souls. The importance of art and music is to give us culture and the opportunity to appreciate the beauty and respect the artists.
Music is an art… Its important purpose is to entertain, by listening to it. From a practical point of view, I would say that music in the soundtrack enhances the mood of films.
